children.raw: Characters that should be escaped in general:
Characters that should be escaped in general:

children.value:
Underscores are _escaped_ unless they appear in_the_middle_of_a_word.
or
children.raw:
Underscores are \_escaped\_ unless they appear in_the_middle_of_a_word.
or

Underscores are \_escaped\_ unless they appear in_the_middle_of_a_word.
or **_here**, or here__

children.value: Ampersands are escaped only when they would otherwise start an entity:
children.raw: Ampersands are escaped only when they would otherwise start an entity:
Ampersands are escaped only when they would otherwise start an entity:

children.value: Open parenthesis should be escaped after a shortcut reference:
children.raw: Open parenthesis should be escaped after a shortcut reference:
Open parenthesis should be escaped after a shortcut reference:

children.value: Hyphen should be escaped at the beginning of a line:
children.raw: Hyphen should be escaped at the beginning of a line:
Hyphen should be escaped at the beginning of a line:

- not a list item
- not a list item
+ not a list item

children.value: Text under a shortcut reference should be preserved verbatim:
children.raw: Text under a shortcut reference should be preserved verbatim:
Text under a shortcut reference should be preserved verbatim:

children.value: Colon should be escaped in URLs:
children.raw: Colon should be escaped in URLs:
Colon should be escaped in URLs:

Double tildes should be \~~escaped\~~.
And here: foo~~.

children.value: Pipes should not be escaped here: |
children.raw: Pipes should not be escaped here: |
Pipes should not be escaped here: |

children.value: Open angle bracket should be escaped:
children.raw: Open angle bracket should be escaped:
Open angle bracket should be escaped:

raw:
Characters that should be escaped in general: \\ \` \* \[ Characters that shouldn't: {}]()#+-.!>"$%',/:;=?@^~ Underscores are \_escaped\_ unless they appear in_the_middle_of_a_word. or **_here**, or here__ Ampersands are escaped only when they would otherwise start an entity: - \©cat \& \& - &copycat & &#x26 - But: ©cat; `≬` &foo; & AT&T &c Open parenthesis should be escaped after a shortcut reference: [ref]\(text) Hyphen should be escaped at the beginning of a line: \- not a list item \- not a list item \+ not a list item Same for angle brackets: \> not a block quote And hash signs: \# not a heading \## not a subheading Text under a shortcut reference should be preserved verbatim: - [two*three] - [two\*three] - [a\a] - [a\\a] - [a\\\a] - [a_a\_a] **GFM:** Colon should be escaped in URLs: - http\://user:password@host:port/path?key=value#fragment - https\://user:password@host:port/path?key=value#fragment - http://user:password@host:port/path?key=value#fragment - https://user:password@host:port/path?key=value#fragment Double tildes should be \~~escaped\~~. And here: foo~~. Pipes should not be escaped here: | | here | they | | ------ | -------- | | should | tho\|ugh | And here: | here | they | \| ---- \| ----- \| | should | though | And here: here | they \---- \| ------ should | though **Commonmark:** Open angle bracket should be escaped: - \
\
- \ - <div></div> - <http:google.com>
